features: Blue Stratos Mens Gents Body Spray Deodorant Original Blue 150ml 3 Pack
description: Product description Blue Stratos Deodorizing Body Spray 150Ml. A Deodorizing Spray That Provides Comprehensive Deodorant Protection And Has The Blue Stratos Scent. Feel Fresh And Confident All Day Long With The Cool Exciting Feel Of Blue Stratos. The Legendary Blue Stratos Deodorant Neutralizes Body Disorder And Keeps You Confidently Fresh. A Body Spray Mixed With The Cool Blue Stratos Scent That Offers Comprehensive Deodorant Protection. Blue Stratos Mens Gents Body Spray Deodorant Original Blue 150ml 3 Pack Brand: Blue Stratos Product type: BODY DEODORANT 150 millilitre Pack of 3" Directions 1. Hold the bottle a certain distance away from the body. 2. Spray the product on the body. 3. Use it to feel fresh and confident.
